Charlie Dominguez.name: Charlie Dominguez
Charlie Dominguez.description: During his engagement with ChkM8, Andrés consistently provided efficient, timely, and high-quality work, proving himself an indispensable part of the team. He collaborated closely with our backend team, creating a dynamic new blogging page and transitioning our website's hosting, which empowered us to manage our content more effectively. Andrés also developed a digital registration process that streamlined onboarding and saved time. His technical expertise, strategic thinking, and attention to detail significantly enhanced our ability to scale and optimize our technology.
